name: L.A.N.T.E.R.N
description:
Details

Try as you might to complete these challenges, pitiful player. 

There are only a few stages this time, but just you wait, the future does not look to be in your favor, but please, keep trying, maybe someone will prove me wrong about humans.

ControlsWASDMovementSpacebarJumpMouseAimScroll WheelMove L.A.N.T.E.R.N.LMBPickup/Throw L.A.N.T.E.R.N.RMBPlace L.A.N.T.E.R.N.QStasisELight Burst
Future

We would love to do a complete revamp of the levels with an actual level designer and continue to build out actual puzzles from the mechanics we have. That it the current plan but showing that people want to see it progress will help motivate us all to work diligently and make genuinely interesting and challenging puzzles.

Full version would include

  • 8 unique gems
  • 8 unique ground materials
  • More thought out storyline
  • Well designed puzzles
Team Members Cameron HowellArtistNick AllenProgrammerJulia BromanVoice ActorTrent StablerAudio Engineer
